#summary API Methods

= Methods List =

The following API methods are available (each is explained in more detail below):

|| *Method* || *Description* ||
|| profile || Returns the user's public profile ||
|| profile_favorites || Returns the list of favorite videos that appear on a user's profile page ||
|| profile_friends || Returns the list of favorite friends that appear on a user's profile page ||
|| profile_shares || Returns the list of recently shared videos that appear on a user's profile page ||
|| profile_shows || Returns the list of favorite TV shows that appear on a user's profile page ||
|| personality || Returns the video personality type that appears on a user's profile page ||
